data.title: Department of English
data.meta_description: John Algeo (1931-2019), Alumni Foundation Distinguished Professor, Head of the Department of English, and Director of Linguistics A memorial written by Fredric Dolezal With sadness and a great feeling of loss we mark the death of Emeritus Professor John Algeo, Professor of English 1971-1994, who died October 13, 2019 in Bowling Green, Kentucky. He was born November 12, 1930 in St. Louis, Missouri.
